name: Contingency Plan #GMTKJam2020
description:
Aliens are invading the Spire and it's up to the finest crack team of Earth's defenders to save it! Unfortunately, they weren't available.

Luckily, we've prepared a list of contingencies for this exact situation as well as a team of volunteers and other people we've kidnapped. Use them to hold off the alien swarm and launch into space.

---

Art: https://aekashics.itch.io/aekashics-librarium-librarium-static-batch-megapack

Help in finding said art: Fish and Sid.
